thread.title: Dr. James Andrews performs knee surgery on Kansas City Chiefs' Jamaal Charles: 4 points
thread.title_full: Dr. James Andrews performs knee surgery on Kansas City Chiefs' Jamaal Charles: 4 points

author: avaidya@beckershealthcare.com (Anuja Vaidya)
title: Dr. James Andrews performs knee surgery on Kansas City Chiefs' Jamaal Charles: 4 points
text:
Dr. James Andrews performs knee surgery on Kansas City Chiefs' Jamaal Charles: 4 points Written by Anuja Vaidya | Friday, 23   
James Andrews, MD, performed knee surgery on Kansas City Chiefs running back Jamaal Charles, according to a report by The Wichita Eagle . 
Here are four points: 

1. Mr. Charles tore his anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee in a game against the Chicago Bears on Oct. 11. 

2. Dr. Andrews is the founding member of Andrews Sports Medicine and Orthopaedic Institute in Gulf Breeze, Fla. 

3. He is a senior consultant for the Washington Redskins and the orthopedic medical director for the Tampa Bay Rays. 

4. He is a past-president of the American Orthopaedic Society for Sports Medicine and led the STOP Sports Injuries campaign.
